name: Riryoku
desc: Target 2 face-up monsters on the field; halve the ATK of 1 monster, and if you do, add that lost ATK to the other monster. These effects last until the End Phase.
str1: Select monster to halve the ATK
str2: Select the monster to gain ATK

ocg.pack: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 4: Battle of Great Duelist: Kaiba Deck promotional cards
